entry.source: We were able to find the body of my husband{F801}Osiris, but the evil {F804,5}Seth{F804,0} was waiting for me{F801}to do so. Now he has dismembered Osiris' body{F801}and scattered the pieces {F804,5}across Tokyo.{F804,0} Please{F801}{F804,5}recover the pieces{F804,0} and help me resurrect him.{F801}I will be waiting {F804,5}at the base of Tokyo Tower.{F804,0}{F801}
